component.name: addOrChangeTranslationOfSurveyField
component.description: Add or change the translated value of the survey field if a survey field can be translated or is already translated into a particular language.

component.name: addOrUpdateTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
component.description: If one or more survey fields can be translated or are already translated, adds or updates the translated values of the survey fields in the languages into which survey fields can be translated.

component.name: deleteTheTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
component.description: Deletes the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

component.name: deleteTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
component.description: Delete the translated values of multiple survey fields after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.

component.name: getTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
component.description: Retrieves the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

component.name: getTranslatedValuesOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
component.description: Retrieves the translated values of multiple survey fields in the translated languages after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.
